an sich ein gutes game aber die entwickler interesieren sich ein scheiÃŸ dafÃ¼r ob es anderen gefÃ¤llt oder nicht.
ganze zeit laufen nur smurf rum leute die einfach nur noch roxic sind wie noch was und da hat man irgendwan als spieler keine lust mehr weil man sich denkt , warum sollte ich meine wertvolle zeit in so ein game reinstecken wen die entwickler nur auf geld aus sind und nicht auf die zufriedenheit ihere kunden

No. Do not even think about buying this game. You will have less fun than frustration. Survivors trolling and bullying Killers and sometimes even their own teammates, Killers playing dirty. And it goes around in a never-ending circle. Many players are using cheats and developers do nothing about it. You will have an insane disadvantage starting in this game. Your opponents will have thousands of hours and all possible items. And learning experience is awful, unless you find other people to learn with you in private lobbies. One thing this game is good at is testing your mental health.
å‚» é€¼æ¸¸æˆåŒ¹é…æœºåˆ¶ï¼Œä½ æ°¸è¿œç¢°åˆ°ä½ æ¯”æ®µä½é«˜çš„äººï¼Œæ— è®ºä½ åœ¨å“ª

It's a good game. I now see the buggy hitboxes of killers' swings and pallets as features, as the lead to some hilarious rages and situations, especially if you play with friends. Matchmaking is better than in any other game, i mean who doesn't like killing rank 18s and red ranks in one lobby? The new MMR system only makes it worse, tbh. The only advice i'd give, is not to play survivor alone, and not to get irritatet as killer. Whilst camping is bullshit, use what you have at your disposal. No perks or stragegies are forbidden. As long as the game doesn't punish you point wise - you're doing just fine

o jogo em si Ã© muito interessante e divertido, a questÃ£o de jogar com outras 3 pessoas ou contra 4 pessoas sem possibilidade alguma de comunicaÃ§Ã£o verbal ou escrita Ã© muito bacana, desafiadora e tambÃ©m divertida pois toda partida parece algo bem diferente da passada graÃ§as a variedade de assassinos e de sobreviventes, sÃ³ uma coisa que eu nÃ£o curto nada do jogo Ã© a progressÃ£o, precisa basicamente jogar por no mÃ­nimo 50 horas farmando sem parar pra conseguir comprar UM personagem no jogo, Ã© algo beeeeeeeeeem quebrado que eu nÃ£o curti nem um pouco de vista... Ã© como jogos mobile te forÃ§ando a comprar algo pro dinheiro real mesmo, alÃ©m das filas de espera por partida bemmmmm longa, as vezes demora 2 minutos, as vezes 10, as vezes 15, tudo depende do dia pelo visto pois o jogo nÃ£o conta mais com a quantidade de player jogando simultaneamente aparentemente, outro ponto negativo Ã© a toxidade de algumas partidas, as vezes Ã© realmente frustrante jogar contra players tÃ³xicos mas nÃ£o Ã© tÃ£o frequente... digamos que de 15 partidas sÃ³ 3 tive algum killer ou survivor tÃ³xico; tirando esses pontos negativos o jogo ainda sim Ã© bem divertido de se jogar, ainda mais com um ou mais de um amigo sendo bem aberto pra muitas possibilidades de estratÃ©gias em grupo para vencer, ainda lembrando da progressÃ£o que Ã© quebrada por que Ã© chato realmente ter de jogar por nem sei quantas horas farmando igual um maluco pra upar pra um lvl super alto e finalmente comprar um personagem, ai em diante nÃ£o comprar mais pois acabou os pontos que ganhou em todo esse tempo

A game with diminishing returns

I played it quite a bit for awhile but since the twins update. I just can't care about this game anymore. 
I personally played killer the most but most of the time it felt like a frustrating mess. it almost felt like life, a constant drag with some small glimpses of joy that's enough to carry you further except this game is supposed to be a small relief not a source of more stress. 

playing it with friends makes it more tolerable but then game balance comes in question and oh boy.

I'll admit I have not played for a very very long time so I can't comment on current balancing but what I can comment on is the devs handling feedback, the PTB mostly it takes months for a buff to a killer to come and how it's going now with the new killer he is weak and it's gonna take another 2 months before he gets buffed. the PTB is nothing but a hype machine. it isn't for players to give feedback on but for YT to make vids

also this is by far the worst community I have ever seen. from all the online games I have played never did anyone except from this game go to my profile just to rant or insult me after a match. trying to be nice in this game is just dropping a crumb of sugar in a silo of salt

in all honesty, just watch Otzdarva play. you'll enjoy your time much more

yes

I really liked this game at first, but after seeing several updates and fails I can't recommend this game. It has major desync issues (survivors see the killers location differently and land hits they shouldn't). The match making is also an absolute joke. Whether they use their terrible SBMM or their "rank" based match making. I've only played for a few weeks and it's putting me with the highest ranked players in the game 1-4 and I'm rank 10-11. And don't get me started on this games terrible character hit boxes.

Edit: Forgot to mention the perk system in the game. If you're playing killer and new, enjoy playing against survivors who have been playing for a while that have unlocked all the OP character perks while you run the first level base perk. The way the system works is through a "blood web". Essentially you use blood points to fill up the web. Upon filling up the web you level up. To unlock the perks so they are available to other survivors you need to hit level 30,35, and 40. So enjoy the endless grind and constant disadvantage.

Edit 2: Just don't buy the game unless you get it on a massive sale, and definitely don't buy the DLC. The devs have no interest in fixing any of the bugs, in fact they'll just remove content for an unknown amount of time just to return it still broken. At this point they're just milking the game before it dies.
